EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to {!Community.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to the {!Community.Name} {!Receiving_User.Username}
Your TechnologyOne Customer Community is the central hub to connect, chat and collaborate with TechnologyOne and with other customers.
The Customer Community takes the support experience to an entirely new level, delivering a modern, clean and engaging user experience, anywhere, any time, on any device.
Key features
Access knowledge articles Suggest ideas for product enhancements Engage with product experts and customers Ask questions, and help answer other customer questions Keep up to date on trending topics, articles and more
Ready to activate your account?
To get started, go to
{!Community.Url}
Please note the link in this email will expire within 24 hours so be sure to activate your account quickly.
As you log in, you will be asked to create and confirm a password, then click on the Change Password button and the Customer Community Home Page will be displayed.
Registering again or reactivating your account?
Please note that your username is your work email address and you will need to reset your password via the Forgot Password link.
Knowledge Articles for more information
Customer Community - Getting Started Collaborating in the Customer Community
Refer to the Community User & Support Guides topic for more.
We look forward to seeing you in the Community! So make sure you click the link before it expires.
TechnologyOne Community Team
